headline.main: Brazil Mining Reform Bills May Go to Congress in Weeks: Minister
headline.print_headline: Brazil Mining Reform Bills May Go to Congress in Weeks: Minister

lead_paragraph: Bills to reform Brazil's mining industry are expected to go before Congress in late March or early April and could be enacted by 110 days after that, the country's mines and energy minister said in an interview on Sunday.
snippet: Bills to reform Brazil's mining industry are expected to go before Congress in late March or early April and could be enacted by 110 days after that, the country's mines and energy minister said in an interview on Sunday....
